product_name: The North Face Surge II Daypack - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Surge II Daypack from The North Face features a suspension designed to fit women, letting you carry your daily work or school essentials, including a laptop and a tablet, in comfort. Dedicated, zippered and padded laptop sleeve handles laptops up to 17 in.; neoprene sleeve holds up to a 10 in. tablet. Main pocket holds books, papers and files. Middle pocket features a deluxe organizer; front pocket features dual zip access to multiple pockets for must-have items. Zippered and padded bottom compartment is sized to hold a power cord and other accessories. Side stretch-woven pocket keeps your water bottles from bouncing around. Women-specific adjustable, padded shoulder straps and padded back panel offer load-carrying comfort; polyethylene sheet along back adds structure and support. Padded and stowable hipbelt enhances carrying support and stability. Constructed of abrasion-, moisture- and tear-resistant ballistic nylon for exceptional durability. The North Face women's Surge II Daypack also has reflective hits to increase visibility in low light and a daisy chain to lash on gear. This pack is endorsed by the American Chiropractic Association, recognizing the comfort and function of its shoulder straps, back panel and interior organization. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Surge II Daypack from The North Face features a suspension designed to fit women, letting you carry your daily work or school essentials, including a laptop and a tablet, in comfort.
